statements: DELETE FROM inventory_management WHERE product_id = 101 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM inventory_management WHERE demand_pattern = 'High' AND stock_level <= 20;
DELETE FROM stock_adjustments WHERE adjustment_date < '2022-01-01' AND adjustment_quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM Sales WHERE Quantity > 100 AND SaleDate < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM StockAdjustments WHERE AdjustmentType = 'Damaged' AND AdjustmentQuantity < 0;
DELETE FROM products WHERE id = 102 AND price > 50;
DELETE FROM sales WHERE sale_date < '2022-01-01' AND sale_amount < 1000;
DELETE FROM sales_orders WHERE customer_id = 101 AND status = 'cancelled';
DELETE FROM inventory_items WHERE item_id = 500 OR item_category = 'Electronics';
